headline: Packaging Corporation of America Schedules Conference Call to Discuss Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Operating Results
summary: LAKE FOREST, Ill., December 29, 2025--Packaging Corporation of America (NYSE: PKG) will hold a conference call on Wednesday, January 28, 2026, at 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time to discuss fourth quarter and full year 2025 results. The conference call leader will be Mark Kowlzan. Fourth quarter and full year earnings results will be released after the market closes on Tuesday, January 27, 2026.
